title: Ciaphus Cain. Hero of the Imperium
creator: Mitchell, Sandy, 1958-
description: In the 41st Millennium, Commissar Ciaphas Cain is looking for an easy life, but fate has a habit of throwing him into the deadliest situations and luck always manages to pull him through
Collects the novels For the Emperor, Caves of Ice and The traitor's hand, plus three exclusive short stories.--Cover, p. 4
subject: Cain, Ciaphas (Fictitious character) -- Fiction
Science fiction, English
